entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening then partly cloudy. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
